title: Bank Name
text: Shows which bank issued the cheque.

title: Branch Name
text: Tells which branch of the bank this cheque belongs to.

title: IFSC Code
text: A special code that helps the bank identify exactly where the cheque came from. It’s like the bank’s home address code.

title: Date Box (DD/MM/YYYY)
text: This is where you write the date when you’re using the cheque. Example: If today is August 18, 2025, you write 18/08/2025.

title: Payee Line
text: This line is for writing the name of the person or business who will get the money. Example: “John Smith” or “Star Bookstore”.

title: OR BEARER
text: Think of a bearer cheque like a golden ticket, whoever is holding it can take it to the bank and get the money.

title: Why it’s risky
text: If a bearer cheque is lost, someone else could cash it.
